description: A music streaming service asks SEOAuditPro to verify that each artist page contains proper Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata. The assistant crawls the site, runs on‑page SEO checks, fetches the backlink profile, and generates a markdown SEO audit report with prioritized recommendations.

messages.content: You are SEOAuditPro, an AI‑powered SEO auditor. Use the provided tools to crawl websites, run on‑page SEO checks, fetch backlink data, and generate a markdown‑formatted audit report. Present findings clearly and prioritize actions for the user.

We run a music streaming service and want to make sure every artist page includes appropriate Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata. Please audit https://musicstream.com/artists and give me a report with recommendations.
I’ll start by crawling the site to collect the artist pages.

{"pages": [{"url": "https://musicstream.com/artists", "html": "Artists | MusicStream...The Beatles"}, {"url": "https://musicstream.com/artists/beatles", "html": "The Beatles – MusicStream..."}, {"url": "https://musicstream.com/artists/taylor-swift", "html": "Taylor Swift – MusicStream..."}]}"
The crawl is complete. I’ll now run on‑page SEO checks on the discovered pages, focusing on Open Graph and Twitter Card tags.

pages.html: ...The Beatles

<html><head><title>The Beatles – MusicStream</title><meta name="description" content="The Beatles discography"/><meta property="og:title" content="The Beatles"/><meta property="og:image" content="https://musicstream.com/images/beatles.jpg"/><meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image"/></head><body>...</body></html>
<html><head><title>Taylor Swift – MusicStream</title><meta name="description" content="Taylor Swift songs"/></head><body>...</body></html>

messages.content: {"results": [{"url": "https://musicstream.com/artists", "issues": [{"type": "missing_og_tags", "description": "Open Graph tags (og:title, og:image, etc.) are missing.", "recommendation": "Add appropriate og:title, og:description, og:image, and related tags for the artists index page."}, {"type": "missing_twitter_card", "description": "Twitter Card meta tag is missing.", "recommendation": "Add <meta name='twitter:card' content='summary_large_image'> and related tags."}]}, {"url": "https://musicstream.com/artists/beatles", "issues": []}, {"url": "https://musicstream.com/artists/taylor-swift", "issues": [{"type": "missing_og_tags", "description": "Open Graph tags are missing.", "recommendation": "Add og:title, og:description, og:image for Taylor Swift page."}, {"type": "missing_twitter_card", "description": "Twitter Card tag is missing.", "recommendation": "Add <meta name='twitter:card' content='summary_large_image'> with appropriate title, description, and image."}]}]}
The on‑page analysis is done. Next, I’ll retrieve the backlink profile for the domain to see if any external factors could affect SEO.

{"backlinks": [{"source_url": "https://blog.musicnews.com/beatles-tribute", "domain_authority": 78, "anchor_text": "The Beatles on MusicStream"}, {"source_url": "https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taylor_Swift", "domain_authority": 95, "anchor_text": "Taylor Swift – MusicStream"}, {"source_url": "https://forum.musicfans.com/thread/12345", "domain_authority": 45, "anchor_text": "Check out Taylor Swift"}]}
Backlink data collected. I will now compile everything into a markdown audit report.

issues.description: Open Graph tags (og:title, og:image, etc.) are missing.
issues.recommendation: Add appropriate og:title, og:description, og:image, and related tags for the artists index page.

issues.description: Twitter Card meta tag is missing.
issues.recommendation: Add <meta name='twitter:card' content='summary_large_image'> and related tags.
Add og:title, og:description, og:image for Taylor Swift page.
Add <meta name='twitter:card' content='summary_large_image'> with appropriate title, description, and image.

messages.content:
# SEO Audit Report – MusicStream Artist Pages

**Site URL:** https://musicstream.com/artists

---

## Executive Summary

The audit identified missing Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata on the main artists index page and the Taylor Swift artist page. These omissions can reduce click‑through rates from social platforms and hinder content sharing. No critical guideline violations were found. Backlink profile is healthy, with several high‑authority links pointing to the Beatles and Taylor Swift pages.

---

## On‑Page Issues & Recommendations

### 1. https://musicstream.com/artists
| Issue | Description | Priority | Recommendation |
|-------|-------------|----------|----------------|
| Missing Open Graph tags | og:title, og:description, og:image, etc. are absent. | High | Add meta tags such as `<meta property="og:title" content="MusicStream Artists">`, `<meta property="og:description" content="Explore thousands of artists on MusicStream">`, and a representative image via `<meta property="og:image" content="https://musicstream.com/assets/artist-index.jpg">`.
| Missing Twitter Card | No `twitter:card` tag. | Medium | Include `<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">` and matching `twitter:title`, `twitter:description`, `twitter:image` tags.

### 2. https://musicstream.com/artists/taylor-swift
| Issue | Description | Priority | Recommendation |
|-------|-------------|----------|----------------|
| Missing Open Graph tags | og:title, og:description, og:image are missing. | High | Add appropriate OG tags for the Taylor Swift page, e.g., `<meta property="og:title" content="Taylor Swift – MusicStream">` and a high‑resolution album art image.
| Missing Twitter Card | No `twitter:card` tag. | Medium | Add the standard Twitter Card tags with a large image of Taylor Swift.

---

## Backlink Profile Highlights

| Source URL | Domain Authority | Anchor Text |
|------------|------------------|-------------|
| https://blog.musicnews.com/beatles-tribute | 78 | The Beatles on MusicStream |
| https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taylor_Swift | 95 | Taylor Swift – MusicStream |
| https://forum.musicfans.com/thread/12345 | 45 | Check out Taylor Swift |

The backlink profile is strong, especially the Wikipedia link (DA 95) which boosts credibility for the Taylor Swift page.

---

## Action Plan
1. **Implement missing OG and Twitter Card tags** on the affected pages (priority High).
2. **Validate tags** using Facebook Sharing Debugger and Twitter Card Validator.
3. **Monitor social click‑through rates** after changes (Google Search Console → Performance → Social).
4. **Maintain backlink health** by regularly checking for lost or toxic links.

---

*Report generated by SEOAuditPro on 2025-12-08.*

The SEO audit is complete. Below is the markdown report summarizing the findings and recommendations for your artist pages. Let me know if you’d like me to walk through any specific section or help implement the suggested meta tags.

---

# SEO Audit Report – MusicStream Artist Pages

**Site URL:** https://musicstream.com/artists

---

## Executive Summary

The audit identified missing Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata on the main artists index page and the Taylor Swift artist page. These omissions can reduce click‑through rates from social platforms and hinder content sharing. No critical guideline violations were found. Backlink profile is healthy, with several high‑authority links pointing to the Beatles and Taylor Swift pages.

---

## On‑Page Issues & Recommendations

### 1. https://musicstream.com/artists
| Issue | Description | Priority | Recommendation |
|-------|-------------|----------|----------------|
| Missing Open Graph tags | og:title, og:description, og:image, etc. are absent. | High | Add meta tags such as `<meta property="og:title" content="MusicStream Artists">`, `<meta property="og:description" content="Explore thousands of artists on MusicStream">`, and a representative image via `<meta property="og:image" content="https://musicstream.com/assets/artist-index.jpg">`.
| Missing Twitter Card | No `twitter:card` tag. | Medium | Include `<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">` and matching `twitter:title`, `twitter:description`, `twitter:image` tags.

### 2. https://musicstream.com/artists/taylor-swift
| Issue | Description | Priority | Recommendation |
|-------|-------------|----------|----------------|
| Missing Open Graph tags | og:title, og:description, og:image are missing. | High | Add appropriate OG tags for the Taylor Swift page, e.g., `<meta property="og:title" content="Taylor Swift – MusicStream">` and a high‑resolution album art image.
| Missing Twitter Card | No `twitter:card` tag. | Medium | Add the standard Twitter Card tags with a large image of Taylor Swift.

---

## Backlink Profile Highlights

| Source URL | Domain Authority | Anchor Text |
|------------|------------------|-------------|
| https://blog.musicnews.com/beatles-tribute | 78 | The Beatles on MusicStream |
| https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taylor_Swift | 95 | Taylor Swift – MusicStream |
| https://forum.musicfans.com/thread/12345 | 45 | Check out Taylor Swift |

The backlink profile is strong, especially the Wikipedia link (DA 95) which boosts credibility for the Taylor Swift page.

---

## Action Plan
1. **Implement missing OG and Twitter Card tags** on the affected pages (priority High).
2. **Validate tags** using Facebook Sharing Debugger and Twitter Card Validator.
3. **Monitor social click‑through rates** after changes (Google Search Console → Performance → Social).
4. **Maintain backlink health** by regularly checking for lost or toxic links.

---

*Report generated by SEOAuditPro on 2025-12-08.*
